text: Great Malvern is an area of the spa town of Malvern, Worcestershire, England. It lies at the foot of the Malvern Hills. It is on the eastern flanks of the Worcestershire Beacon and North Hill, and is the historic centre of Malvern and includes its town centre. ==Other websites== *Visit The Malverns â€” Great Malvern Category:Towns in Worcestershire
title: Great Malvern
